chatkit-env-validate.description: Validate ChatKit environment variables before commit

python-lint.command: if [[ "$FILE_PATH" =~ \.py$ ]] && [[ "$FILE_PATH" =~ ^(backend|examples).*/.*\.py$ ]]; then (cd "${FILE_PATH%/*/*}" && uv run ruff check . --fix) || echo '⚠ Python linting completed'; fi

typescript-lint.command: if [[ "$FILE_PATH" =~ \.(ts|tsx)$ ]] && [[ "$FILE_PATH" =~ ^(frontend|examples).*/src.*\.(ts|tsx)$ ]]; then (cd "${FILE_PATH%/*/*}" && npm run lint 2>/dev/null) || echo '⚠ TypeScript linting completed'; fi
